item.description:
Let's attend the second day of the 18th Annual Boston Wine Expo. Check out their website for prices and events. Buy your ticket at the door, at your local wine shop, or on line. We will meet as a group at the ticket entrance (the place where they take your ticket and give you your wine tasting glass). This is a BIG place. Look for our meetup sign. If you're looking to carpool, let other members know your location and we can find ways to drive in.


http://www.wine-expos...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a sign at the main ticket entrance

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Boston Wine Expo on Sunday 25th
